name: ALL HE CAN EAT
description:
The holy JumJum wants sacrifices. Bring him what he wants or lose his favor.

ALL HE CAN EAT is an insane 3D searching game with as much fun as panic.

Supports 1-4 players, keyboard and many controllers.

Visit us at:

Twitter

Or join our community at:

Discord

This game was created for the 43th Ludum Dare game jam. 

Bugs and errors belong to the finder.
